revision.text: {{also|yíbah}} ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|yi-prog|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-bah|progressive}} {{nv-link-to-root|-BAAʼ|raid}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she is going along [[raid#Verb|raiding]], is going along the [[warpath#Noun|warpath]] ====Usage notes==== This is a progressive verb; it is conjugated only in the progressive mode. ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|progressive|yi}}. {{nv-verbtable|PROGRESSIVE |yishbah|yiibah|deíníibááh|yíbah|wohbah|deínóhbááh|yibah|deíbááh|joobah|dajíbááh}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|nv|yibááh}}
